greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Delete all 6's from the sequence of nonnegative integers.
mathematica: d6[n_]:=Module[{c=DeleteCases[IntegerDigits[n],6]},If[c=={},Nothing, FromDigits[ c]]]; Array[d6,80,0] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 09 2017 *)
program: return 5 if k == m else int(str(k).replace('6','')) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Apr 20 2021
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
